name: CoomerDL
description: Universal Media Downloader - Web Application supporting 1000+ websites

DEBUG.description: Enable debug mode (not recommended for production)

SECRET_KEY.description: Secret key for JWT tokens and session management. IMPORTANT: Change this!

STORAGE_TYPE.description: Storage backend: 'local' for Heroku filesystem (temporary) or 'gcs' for Google Cloud Storage (recommended)

GCS_BUCKET.description: Google Cloud Storage bucket name (only required if STORAGE_TYPE=gcs)

GOOGLE_CLOUD_PROJECT.description: Google Cloud project ID (only required if STORAGE_TYPE=gcs)

DOWNLOAD_FOLDER.description: Local download folder (only used if STORAGE_TYPE=local)

CORS_ORIGINS.description: Allowed CORS origins (comma-separated). Use * for development only.

scripts.postdeploy: echo 'CoomerDL deployed successfully! Visit the app URL to access the web interface.'
